Name: Pura Vida
Ingredients: 40 ml Del Maguey Vida Clásico Mezcal
10 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Lightly smoked earthy coffee with hints of zesty orange.
History: Created in 2016 by Riccardo Aletta (AKA 'Ricky D Wing') at Holy Birds in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Pura Vida contains 162 calories
